<figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nuezli5NFD1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><figure data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DQcitvaavBbs" data-orig-height="304" data-orig-width="540" data-provider="youtube" class="tmblr-embed tmblr-full"><iframe id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QcitvaavBbs?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="304" width="540"></iframe></figure><p>RoninPawn

has just passed a small landmark: 7000 subscribers. Congratulations!

For those of you unfamiliar with his channel, RoninPawn produces a new

episode of his KSP series Hardcore Pawn every week. The episodes are put

together excellently and we find them very entertaining. <b>Subscribe to<a href="https://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=roninpawn"> RoninÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s channel</a></b><a href="https://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=roninpawn"> and help hi</a>m make his dream of becoming a full-time YouTuber a reality.<br/></p>

Ronin Pawn is one of the funniest YouTubers playing KSP (or really in any game). Unlike certain no-talent gaming YouTube "sensations" that are considered funny because they scream at the microphone, Pawn actually uses witty humor and voice acting. I highly recommend subscribing to his channel.

Ronin Pawn is one of the funniest YouTubers playing KSP (or really in any game). Unlike certain no-talent gaming YouTube "sensations" that are considered funny because they scream at the microphone, Pawn actually uses witty humor and voice acting. I highly recommend subscribing to his channel.

I fear I may be one of these no-talent "sensations." Except I'm not actually a sensation. Ah well.

At any rate: Roninpawn is absolutely wonderful. While I normally don't like videos that last for twenty or thirty minutes (I don't actually like Scott Manley that much, but don't tell anyone!), RoninPawn is always entertaining to listen to. I third the notion of "check his channel out, it's pretty awesome!"

Oh, and can anyone verify that this is the earliest Video Wednesday ever posted? I've been watching these things since late 2013, and I think this is the earliest one I've ever seen

-Upsilon

I fear I may be one of these no-talent "sensations." Except I'm not actually a sensation. Ah well.

Oh come on of course your channel is great! Your physics breaking videos are hilarious!

At any rate: Roninpawn is absolutely wonderful. Ha! It's funny because I'm actually not the biggest fan of him either...

Oh, and can anyone verify that this is the earliest Video Wednesday ever posted? I've been watching these things since late 2013, and I think this is the earliest one I've ever seen

-Upsilon

Woah I think you're right. It's 9:38 over at SQUAD HQ (And same for me, the benefits of the west coast :3) and They usually show up about 3-4 hours from now. Huh.

I fear I may be one of these no-talent "sensations." Except I'm not actually a sensation. Ah well.

Oh no, I'm specifically referring to one YouTuber who I find incredibly annoying, always pops up on my 'recommended viewing list', doesn't play much KSP, and his name rhymes with SpewLieRye.

EDIT: And FWIW your KSP Music alone proves talent.

Edited September 9, 2015 by Alshain

I just finished watching the whole series of his videos, Ronin Pown is hilarious! He is not super experienced, and doing all mistakes we all have done, but the way he handle them is just... Thank you man for this entertainment )
Absolutely! RoninPawn is a great Youtuber. His new series is extremely entertaining.
